授業目的: Students will learn how the article is organised to find a main idea, and how the main idea is supported by surrounding sentences/passages. To read without depending on Japanese translation.
到達目標:
At the end of the semester, students will acquire the following skills.
1. Through intensive reading, students will improve basic reading comprehension skills required to understand descriptive, reasoning and problem-solving passages. Students will also learn science-based styles by reading materials related to their major.
2. Vocabulary building by learning words and expressions used in the textbook and sub-text.
3. Extensive reading is meant for fluency reading. Graded Readers books are used (however, if the class is switched to online, your teacher will provide different materials for extensive reading).
授業方法:
1. English is used in class.
2. Preparation before the class is essential.
3. Occasional workshops are conducted
If online learning is scheduled, the course format will be changed. Please follow your teacher’s instruction.

トピック.授業外学習2:
1. Students are requested to prepare for each lesson as instructed in the Course Outline.
2. Students are requested to read 5 Graded Readers books, and submit their reports (in the case of online learning, the teacher will provide some extensive reading materials).
